Read Quran Because:
Read the Qur'an! As it will come on the Day of Judgment as a savior for those who read it.

Read Az Zahrowain (two chapters of light), Al Baqarah and Ali-Imran, and the both of them will come on the Day of Resurrection like two clouds or like two rays of sunlight or like two birds spreading their wings, both will become your shelter from the scorching sun of Al-Mahsyar.
